page.title: 10Recreation,cont.
page.content: The area contains a large proportion of open land and as most of the recreational opportunities result in using the{open air environment. There are numerous{footpaths}through the fields which allow{ramblers}and {walkers}to enjoy the countryside. There are many{private stables}from which horse riders can exercise their mounts;although nowhere is there the opportunity to hire a horse. {Elton Reservoir}and the numerous lodges in the area provide{fishing. Many of these are reserved for private clubs.The reservoir is fishable on a daily basis and is much used. Elton Reservoir has supported a {sailing club}from 1846 when it was a gentlemen's rowing club.It now supports over one hundred sailing boats.
